In this issue, we're thrilled to share a fascinating Case Study on Strategic Bundling in marine cargo claims. Discover how we're transforming previously overlooked, low-value cases into powerful negotiation tools, significantly increasing recovery potential and shifting leverage in your favor. You'll learn how this innovative approach secures favorable settlements and creates new avenues for success, even in challenging jurisdictions.

View this email in your browser <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/KKj2CrMz4T72OO8tmUkh4mUUP?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com>  	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/Qg-TCv9E4IqAZZ7UZcEhQC_ux?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
In this issue, we're thrilled to share a fascinating Case Study on Strategic Bundling in marine cargo claims. Discover how we're transforming previously overlooked, low-value cases into powerful negotiation tools, significantly increasing recovery potential and shifting leverage in your favor. You'll learn how this innovative approach secures favorable settlements and creates new avenues for success, even in challenging jurisdictions.

We also bring you an update from Central America and the Caribbean, where Carlos Vila Moret and Martín Brandani recently strengthened our strategic alliances in Panama and the Dominican Republic. Their trip focused on consolidating our Recoveries service and introducing our enhanced Claims service (inspections and adjustments), now significantly strengthened by the experience and know-how gained with the Browne acquisition.

Last but certainly not least, we're excited to announce that our Andean office is expanding! We're thrilled to share our new address in Bogotá, Colombia, as we continue to grow and better serve our clients in the region.

We hope you enjoy this new edition!
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/20b10890-da79-d592-ad47-cab1594979a5.jpg> 	

CASE STUDY - STRATEGIC BUNDLING

Last but certainly not least, we're excited to announce that our Andean office is expanding! We're thrilled to share our new address in Bogotá, Colombia, as we continue to grow and better serve our clients in the region.

We hope you enjoy this new edition!
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/20b10890-da79-d592-ad47-cab1594979a5.jpg> 	

CASE STUDY - STRATEGIC BUNDLING 


In the competitive world of marine cargo claims, individual low-value cases often face an uphill battle, deemed too small for litigation and frequently closed without recovery. This case study reveals how BARBUSS developed and successfully implemented an innovative bundling strategy, transforming previously overlooked claims into a powerful negotiation tool.

Discover how aggregating seemingly minor cases can dramatically increase your recovery potential and shift the leverage in your favor, even against formidable opponents.

Read on to learn how this approach secures favorable settlements and creates new avenues for success in challenging jurisdictions.
 
Full case here. <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/ArCWCwRG4ikynnGCBfRhJY6tI?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 
Back to index
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/mj5WCx7J4fDxjj1S3hPhyQkcN?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/287dc382-e89c-0ab7-8ddf-2fd9994a1583.jpg> 	

ADVISORY BOARD MEETS

Read on to learn how this approach secures favorable settlements and creates new avenues for success in challenging jurisdictions.
 
Full case here. <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/ArCWCwRG4ikynnGCBfRhJY6tI?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com>

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/mj5WCx7J4fDxjj1S3hPhyQkcN?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/287dc382-e89c-0ab7-8ddf-2fd9994a1583.jpg> 	

ADVISORY BOARD MEETS


We are pleased to announce that a new meeting of the BARBUSS Advisory Board was held recently. During this meeting, the financial situation and overall results of the company for the period were thoroughly reviewed.

Additionally, updates were provided regarding the acquisition of Browne and the ongoing transition process involving the company, its employees, and clients.

We appreciate the continued support and engagement from all stakeholders as we move forward.


Back to index
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/4a4f6c54-fbf7-3592-04ed-72d5d6c45346.jpg> 	

STRENGTHENING ALLIANCES IN PANAMA

  
Carlos Vila Moret and Martín Brandani recently had the opportunity to strengthen our strategic alliances in Central America and the Caribbean. The main goals were to consolidate our Recoveries service and introduce our new Claims service (inspections and adjustments), which is now enhanced by the experience and know-how gained from the acquisition of Browne.

Carlos Vila Moret and Martín Brandani recently had the opportunity to strengthen our strategic alliances in Central America and the Caribbean. The main goals were to consolidate our Recoveries service and introduce our new Claims service (inspections and adjustments), which is now enhanced by the experience and know-how gained from the acquisition of Browne.

The first stop on this important trip was Panama, where they had the privilege of engaging in productive conversations with key players in the insurance sector. We extend our gratitude to Internacional de Seguros, MAPFRE, Acerta Seguros, Chubb, SURA, Mercantil Seguros, and Kam Seguros for their warm welcome.

These meetings have not only solidified valuable relationships but also opened new opportunities for collaboration to transform the risk industry.

EXPANDING SERVICES IN THE DOMINICAN REPUBLIC 


Continuing our commitment to strengthen alliances in Central America and the Caribbean, Carlos Vila Moret and Martín Brandani recently had the opportunity to consolidate our Recoveries service and introduce our Claims service (inspections and adjustments), now integrating the expertise of Browne.

This second stop brought them to the Dominican Republic, where they had fruitful discussions with leading insurance companies and brokers. Special thanks to our hosts for their exceptional hospitality and collaborative spirit: SURA, La Colonial de Seguros, Seguros Universal, Seguros Crecer, MAPFRE BHD, and Seguros Reservas (Banreservas).

This second stop brought them to the Dominican Republic, where they had fruitful discussions with leading insurance companies and brokers. Special thanks to our hosts for their exceptional hospitality and collaborative spirit: SURA, La Colonial de Seguros, Seguros Universal, Seguros Crecer, MAPFRE BHD, and Seguros Reservas (Banreservas).

These meetings were incredibly valuable, allowing us to explore new opportunities and showcase how our innovative solutions can transform the risk industry.

CONNECTING AT THE MARINE FORUM SOUTH AFRICA

CONNECTING AT THE MARINE FORUM SOUTH AFRICA

 
We have been part of the 40th anniversary edition of the Marine Forum in South Africa, with our UK & MEA Country Manager, Pablo María de Estrada, representing our team.
 
The Forum, an annual meeting point for local insurers, reinsurers, brokers, surveyors, and attorneys, was particularly special this year with its "Casino Royale" theme. It was a valuable experience to engage with the South African marine market and understand the challenges and opportunities facing marine insurers in the region.
 
Thank you to the Organising Team for a well-organized and memorable event. We appreciate the opportunity to connect and strengthen relationships within the marine industry.
 
Back to index

We're thrilled to let you know our new address is Cra. 13 N° 93 – 68, Of. 205, Edificio Rivera Parque 93 (110221) Bogotá, Colombia.
 
A huge thank you to our clients and all our dedicated team members for their incredible support and commitment.
 
Together, we transform the risk industry!
